fetch_push_header.message: Check the 2FAS Pass push notification on your mobile device.
fetch_push_header.description: Header prompting the user to check their device for a push notification

fetch_push_waiting_for_mobile.description: Message displayed while waiting for a response from the mobile app

fetch_connection_error_header.description: Error message displayed when there is a connection issue

fetch_token_unregistered_header.description: Error message displayed when the FCM token is unregistered

fetch_connection_timeout_header.description: Error message displayed when the connection times out due to inactivity

fetch_continue_updating_header.message: Continue updating in the 2FAS Pass app
fetch_continue_updating_header.description: Header prompting the user to continue updating in the mobile app

fetch_continue_updating_description.message:
To update this Item, continue on your 
mobile phone. Please keep this window open.
fetch_continue_updating_description.description: Explains that the user should continue the process on their mobile phone

fetch_full_sync_description.message: To complete the sync process, continue on your mobile device. Please keep this window open.
fetch_full_sync_description.description: Explains that the user should continue the full sync process on their mobile phone

fetch_sif_request_description.message: To fetch Item details, continue on your mobile device. Please keep this window open.
fetch_sif_request_description.description: Explains that the user should continue the SIF request process on their mobile phone

fetch_delete_request_description.message: To delete this Item, continue on your mobile device. Please keep this window open.
fetch_delete_request_description.description: Explains that the user should continue the login deletion process on their mobile phone

fetch_add_request_description.message: To add this Item, continue on your mobile device. Please keep this window open.
fetch_add_request_description.description: Explains that the user should continue the login addition process on their mobile phone

fetch_delete_login_accept_toast.description: Toast message displayed when a login is successfully deleted

fetch_delete_login_cancel_toast.description: Toast message displayed when the user cancels the login deletion process

fetch_fetch_request_accept_toast.description: Toast message displayed when a fetch request is accepted

fetch_fetch_request_cancel_toast.description: Toast message displayed when a fetch request is rejected

fetch_new_login_added_toast.description: Toast message displayed when a new login item is successfully added

fetch_new_login_added_t1_toast.message: New Item added in Tier 1 (only in the mobile app)
fetch_new_login_added_t1_toast.description: Toast shown when a new login is added in tier 1, available only in the mobile app

fetch_new_login_added_in_another_vault_t.message: New Item added in another Vault
fetch_new_login_added_in_another_vault_t.description: Toast shown when a new login is added in another vault

fetch_new_login_cancel_toast.description: Toast message displayed when the user cancels adding a new login item

fetch_generic_request_accept_toast.description: Toast message displayed when a unknown request is accepted

fetch_login_request_accept_toast.description: Toast message displayed when a password request is accepted

fetch_secureNote_request_accept_toast.description: Toast message displayed when a secure note request is accepted

fetch_paymentCard_request_accept_toast.description: Toast message displayed when a payment card request is accepted

fetch_request_cancel_toast.description: Toast message displayed when a request is rejected

fetch_update_login_updated_toast.description: Toast message displayed when a login item is successfully updated

fetch_update_login_cancel_toast.description: Toast message displayed when the user cancels updating a login item

fetch_update_login_added_in_t1_toast.message: Item updated in tier 1 (only in mobile app)
fetch_update_login_added_in_t1_toast.description: Toast shown when a login is updated in tier 1, available only in the mobile app

fetch_update_login_added_in_another_vaul.description: Toast shown when a login is updated in another vault

fetch_full_sync_cancel_toast.description: Toast message displayed when a full sync operation is canceled

fetch_full_sync_completed_toast.description: Toast message displayed when a full sync operation is completed successfully
